articles.title: Trump Meets Putin in Alaska with Future of Ukraine War Hanging in Balance
articles.description: President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin met in Anchorage, Alaska, to discuss the ongoing conflict in Ukraine. The summit concluded without a concrete deal or ceasefire, leaving the future of the war uncertain.

articles.title: Federal Authorities Target Homeless Camps in Washington as Trump's Takeover Continues
articles.description: Federal agents began clearing homeless encampments in Washington, D.C., as part of President Trump's expanded control over the city's law enforcement. The operation has sparked protests and raised concerns about the treatment of unhoused individuals.

articles.title: Florida Plans 'Deportation Depot' to Operate Alongside 'Alligator Alcatraz' ICE Jail
articles.description: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis announced plans to open a second immigration detention center, dubbed 'Deportation Depot,' at a state prison near Jacksonville. This move comes amid legal challenges to the existing 'Alligator Alcatraz' facility.
